get.description: Get a page of audiences for a given account ID

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: External account ID which owns audience.

parameters.name: limitToId
parameters.description: Limits results to the entity IDs specified; parameter key is repeated, eg. limitToId=1&limitToId=2

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of entities returned in a single page; defaults to 25 entities per page

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Returns the specified page of results given a pageSize; pages are 0-indexed

200.description: A page of audiences for the supplied account.

406.description: The Accept header must contain application/json.

415.description: The Content-Type header must be application/json if present.

post.description: Create an audience for a given account ID

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: ID of the account to which this audience belongs.

201.description: The audience that was just created.

400.description: Missing or invalid account ID. - OR - Missing or invalid retailerID field. - OR - Missing or invalid name field. Name should be less than 255 characters. - OR - Missing or invalid userType field. Valid values are: 'buy', 'view'. - OR - The retailerTaxonomyIds is not a valid list of IDs or may contain more than 100 elements. - OR - Missing or invalid lookbackDays field.  Valid values are: 7, 14,  30, 45, 60, 90, 120, 150 or 180. - OR - Exactly one of retailerTaxonomyIds or globalBrandIds must be specified, but not both. - OR - The retailer is invalid because it is not live - OR - The globalBrandIds is not a valid list of IDs or may contain more than 100 elements.

404.description: The audience was not found. - OR - You do not have permission to access these global brands.

406.description: The Accept header must contain application/json.

409.description: An audience name should be unique per account.

415.description: The Content-Type header must be application/json if present.

get.description: Get a page of audiences for a given account ID

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: External account ID which owns audience.

parameters.name: limitToId
parameters.description: Limits results to the entity IDs specified; parameter key is repeated, eg. limitToId=1&limitToId=2

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of entities returned in a single page; defaults to 25 entities per page

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Returns the specified page of results given a pageSize; pages are 0-indexed

200.description: A page of audiences for the supplied account.

403.description: Missing or invalid account ID. - OR - You do not have permission to access this account.

406.description: The Accept header must contain application/json.

415.description: The Content-Type header must be application/json if present.

post.description: Create an audience for a given account ID

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: ID of the account to which this audience belongs.

201.description: The audience that was just created.

400.description: Missing or invalid retailerID field. - OR - Missing or invalid name field. Name should be less than 255 characters. - OR - Missing or invalid userType field. Valid values are: 'buyer', 'viewer'. - OR - The brandIds is not a valid list of IDs or may contain more than 100 elements. - OR - The categoryIds is not a valid list of IDs or may contain more than 100 elements. - OR - Missing or invalid lookbackWindow field. Valid values are: P7D, P14D, P30D, P45D, P60D, P90D, P120D, P150D or P180D. - OR - Exactly one of categoryIds or brandIds must be specified, but not both. - OR - The retailer is invalid because it is not live - OR - Missing or invalid userAction field. Valid values are: 'buy', 'view', 'addToCart'.

406.description: The Accept header must contain application/json.

409.description: An audience name should be unique per account.

415.description: The Content-Type header must be application/json if present.

parameters.name: retailer-id

parameters.name: offset

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return with each call. Must be greater than zero.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The start position in the overall list of matches. Must be zero or greater.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return with each call. Must be greater than zero and less than 1500. 10,000 records deep is the max limit.

traceId.description: The request correlation ID this problem comes from.

traceIdentifier.description: The request correlation ID this problem comes from. (deprecated, use traceId instead)

type.description: The problem's category.

code.description: A machine-readable  error code, expressed as a string value.

instance.description: A URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

source.description: A machine-readable structure to reference to the exact location(s) causing the error(s)

traceId.description: (REQUIRED) The Correlation ID provided by the Gateway. It is also a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

type.description: (REQUIRED) The classification of the error.

code.description: (REQUIRED) A machine-readable unique error code, expressed as a string value. The format used must be kabab-case.

instance.description: (REQUIRED) A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

title.description: (RECOMMENDED) A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

detail.description: (RECOMMENDED) A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

source.description: (OPTIONAL) A machine-readable structure to reference to the exact location(s) causing the error(s)

stackTrace.description: (NEVER IN PRODUCTION) A human-readable stacktrace produced by the implementation technology

id.description: The id of the template variable the value is applied to

status.description: An enumeration of the status of the catalog.

currency.description: An ISO4217 representation of the currency products are listed under in this catalog.

rowCount.description:
An indication of the number of products contained in this catalog. Available when
this catalog reaches a success status.

fileSizeBytes.description: The size of this catalog in bytes. Available when this catalog reaches a success status.

md5Checksum.description:
An MD5 checksum of the catalog for use in confirming complete and uncorrupted retrieval.
Available when this catalog reaches a success status.

createdAt.description: The time this catalog was created. Represented as a UTC ISO8601 string.

message.description: An optional information message intended for developer consumption.

mpn.description: The MPN for the product if available.

modelNumber.description: The Model Number for the product if available.

parentId.description: The ParentId for the product if available.

imageUrl.description: An http image resource provided by the retailer.

updatedAt.description: The last time this product was updated in the Retail Media Catalog. Represented as a UTC ISO8601 string.
